scripts.start: NODE_ENV=dev concurrently "cd ./backend && yarn start" "cd ./frontend && yarn start"
scripts.deploy: (rm -rf /var/www/virtual/hauke/html/* && cd /home/hauke/packages/mtg/frontend && yarn && yarn build && mv /home/hauke/packages/mtg/frontend/build/* /var/www/virtual/hauke/html/ && cd /home/hauke/packages/mtg/backend && yarn && yarn build && supervisorctl restart mtg)
